name: Prezi Desktop Presentation
summary: Learn about .PEZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Prezi Desktop presentations can be exported to standalone applications for Windows and Mac OS X. They may also be uploaded to the Prezi website by registered users for viewing online. The website application requires a Web browser that has the Adobe Flash Player plug-in installed.

description: Presentation created by Prezi Desktop, a program used for making "zooming presentations," which feature a single canvas that can be panned, rotated, and zoomed to view different notes and pictures on the canvas; may contain several zoomed freeze frames that the presenter can navigate through sequentially.
